ygData.subject: Re: Re: gem cutter idea
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You don t even have to waste the pracs.  Just get the bag and other materials.  If you get the You lack the skills... message, then you know you re on
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Feb 16, 2000 at 11:32:18AM -0800, Larry Patterson wrote:
> From: Larry Patterson <axehandler@...>
>
> well personally I think this is at least worth a
> try.... maybe for a gnome enchanter. heck actually
> anyone who can make a gemcutter could test this by
> themselfs. toss 20 points into Jewel making, and pay
> someone to make you some enchanted bars of silver
> <actually you don't even need to enchant the bars to
> make stuff... but I would think it would be a MUCH
> better idea> then toss everything in a back and see
> what comes from a catseye neckless with the gemcutter
> and greese... or catseye gem, silver enchanted bar,
> gemcutter and greese.
>
You don't even have to waste the pracs. Just get the bag and other
materials. If you get the "You lack the skills..." message, then you know
you're on the right track.

Joe D
